testimonials.text: I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Nishant. I had the pleasure of working with Nishant for one year at Infosys, managing on a project team. Nishant’s ability to handle the project was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic increase in the productivity level of our company. No matter how tense a meeting, he made sure he is always calm. As a team member or a leader, Nishant earns my highest recommendation

I met Nishant during a Developer Training Session in Infosys and collaborated with him over few project assignments. Nishant immediately struck me as a very enthusiastic, intelligent person with a hungry for more attitude. I was particularly impressed with his methodical approach to analyze & break down complex problems and then start to solutionize it. His communication skills especially showcase relevant examples and metaphors to convey an idea was impressive. Nishant will be an asset to any team & organization he works for.
